title: I have been unable to place an order of the Pixel 4a
content: Hi Google,I have been unable to place an order of the Pixel 4a, tried a few pin codes in the hope of getting it delivered but unfortunately its not.This is some serious lapse on Flipkart's part as i have raised with flipkart aswell however the problem remains the same, as iam residing in Trivandrum, Kerala India, kindly do th needful as i have been waiting for like 1 month which is forcing me to go for another device.
